fields.description: Can be just the name of a biome, or an array of any size. If an array, each entry can be a biome name string, or an array of size 2, where the first entry is a biome name and the second entry is a positive integer representing how that biome is weighted against other entries. If no weight is provided, a weight of 1 is used.
fields.title: Generate For Climates

fields.description: An array of any size containing arrays of exactly two elements. For each contained array, the first element is a climate category string ('medium', 'warm', 'lukewarm', 'cold', or 'frozen'). The second element is a positive integer for how much that entry is weighted relative to other entries.
fields.title: Hills Transformation
Mutate Transformation
fields.description: What biome to switch to when converting to a mutated biome

fields.title: River Transformation
fields.description: What biome to switch to when converting to a river biome (if not the Vanilla 'river' biome)

fields.title: Shore Transformation
fields.description: What biome to switch to when adjacent to an ocean biome

description: Controls how this biome is instantiated (and then potentially modified) during world generation of the overworld.
title: Minecraft Overworld Generation Rules Biome
